author: Staff Reporter
text:
Police, on Sunday, arrested a 20-year-old youth on charges of stealing a student’s laptop from the hostel of a nursing college in Tambaram. Govindaraju (20) of Mudichur broke into one of the hostel rooms on Wednesday and stole the laptop. He was nabbed on Sunday. The youth was produced before the Judicial Magistrate in Tambaram and was remanded in Puzhal prison, police added.

2 held for snatching purse

Two men who allegedly misbehaved and snatched the purse of a middle-aged woman were arrested by Mannadi police on Sunday. Mohammed Hassan (32) and Rowther (30), who run an eatery in Mannadi, are reported to have harassed the woman, Sachu (40), and also snatched her purse that contained Rs. 1,200. Following a complaint from the woman, the two men were arrested.
title: 20-year-old held for stealing student’s laptop
